name: Vocaloid PoC
summary: A proof-of-concept voice synthesis system that allows users to record phonemes and render text using their own voice
concept: A web-based voice synthesis application where users can create a voice profile by recording phonemes, then use that voice to synthesize speech from text

architecture.overview: Monolithic web application with PHP backend handling user authentication and API endpoints, JavaScript frontend providing UI and audio recording capabilities

authentication.description: User signup and account management system
authentication.implementation: PHP with SQLite database, password hashing with bcrypt

audio_recorder.description: Client-side phoneme recording functionality using MediaRecorder API

current_capabilities: Text input interface for render requests

api_endpoints.description: Request text-to-speech rendering with user's voice

infrastructure.notes: Requires PHP 8.x with SQLite3 support, runs on Apache/Nginx

how_to_run_locally.setup: Ensure PHP 8.x and SQLite are installed
how_to_run_locally.serve: Use PHP built-in server: php -S localhost:8000 from project root
how_to_run_locally.dependencies: No external dependencies required - uses native Web APIs and PDO for database

development_state.scaffold: Basic MVP structure complete with signup, recording, and render request interfaces
development_state.notes: Audio processing and phoneme synthesis backend needs implementation

open_questions: What audio processing library will be used for synthesis?
How will phoneme samples be processed and normalized?
What is the target quality/sample rate for recordings?
Will voice samples be stored on disk or in database?
How will render requests be queued and processed?
next_steps: Implement phoneme sample upload and storage in api/upload.php
Implement voice synthesis engine in api/request_render.php
Implement audio processing pipeline for phoneme samples
Add error handling and validation throughout
current_goals: Complete MVP with working voice synthesis
Support recording and playback of user voice samples
Enable text rendering with synthesized speech
progress_state: Frontend MVP complete, backend synthesis pending
